<DOMAIN>DIGITAL-MEDIA</DOMAIN>
<RESUME_START>
SOFTWARE ENGINEER

SUMMARY

Accomplished development professional with over ten years of experience in integrating IT Operations processes with sustainable customized applications to promote team performance and efficiency gains.
An apt student in programming and markup languages matching multiple technologies together to best enhance and complement IT Service Management and Project Management best practices and deliver consistent, quality solutions in the fast — paced , evolving environment of technology.
Highlights
Languages: HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Perl, XML, XSLT, JSON, PHP, mySQL, VBScript
Frameworks: AngularJS, Bootstrap Certifications: ITIL Foundation, Service-Now Application Developer
Applications/Platforms: Service-Now, Salesforce, Confluence, JIRA, Rally, Gomez, SiteScope, Keynote, Omniture, Urchin, Request Tracker

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Launched Incident Management, Problem Management and Change Management tied to a centralized Configuration Management Database, leveraging Service-Now and Web Services integrations to synchronize and orchestrate information across multiple tools (e.g.
Confluence and a proprietary, custom .NET application) Leveraged Web Services to implement a dashboard framework for data mashups that compares ITSM metrics with business key performance indicators (KPIs) from several tools, such as Service-Now, Omniture, Gomez, and an internal data warehouse, to inform incident root cause Successfully integrated IT Procurement workflows in the Service-Now Service Catalog module including integration points with Excel reports, data exports for Oracle Ebiz, and complex approval email notifications and workflows Coded and implemented a custom interim Web-based CRM tool to share and track customer information and trouble tickets while researching and reviewing full-featured third-party CRM rivals

EXPERIENCE

Software Engineer
September 2012
to
Current
Company Name
— City , State
Digital Media Solutions (VDMS) is a branch of Verizon concentrating on new products primarily focused on the Internet video lifecycle from content perparation to display on all current and emerging platforms.
It acquired Edgecast Networks, a content delivery network, in 2014.
Customize the Service-Now platform using server-side and client-side JavaScript to complement the release of Incident, Problem, and Change management processes and policies Utilize Jelly scripting, and the AngularJS and Bootstrap framework to produce automated management reports with custom UI and navigational features.
Architect the Configuration Management Database (CMDB) to complement Service Operations processes, identifying known errors and driving down Incident resolution times.
Integrate Confluence, JIRA, Service-Now, Active Directory, Bitbucket, and Git to synchronize data between both development and operations, utilizing both native configurations and extended capabilities via web services.

to

Lead a team building out Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery efforts utilizing Maven, Jenkins, Chef, Cloudstack, an Selenium to build, deploy, and test in an automated fashion.
Apply best practices in Agile SCRUM software development, lean manufacturing concepts, and lean startup principles to the IT Operations group to ensure support and maintenance projects are completed in a consistent and predictable manner.
Foster a DevOps community within the organization by creating and promoting a framework that encourages early and frequent communication between development and operations in launching services, from resource provisioning through service architecture and Service Level Agreement (SLA) definitions

Develop and maintain a data visualization (LAMP) application to inform management decisions and technical decisions through event correlation from multiple tools, such as Service-Now, Gomez, and Omniture.

Assess client business objectives and recommend suitable solutions within the allotted budget and time considerations, leveraging the power of video synchronized to animations, slides, text transcripts with interactive chat and polling components to the ideal level.
Supervise and engage in the development, execution, and testing of client projects to ensure on time delivery within the client's demands and constraints.
Manage client requests for enhancement (RFEs) to our products and generate functional specifications based on requirements, analysis and system design.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Digital Analyst (Google Analytics)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Title: Digital Analytics Specialist
Location: Weehawken, NJ
Company: Advaana Inc.
About Advaana Inc.
Advaana Inc., a premier Digital Analytics consulting firm, stands as a martech ally for agencies and marketing teams. We excel in Google Analytics 4, mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze, among other technologies, driving optimization in digital marketing strategies through superior analytics implementations. Our proficiency extends to Google Tag Manager, Adobe Analytics, Adobe Experience Platform, Looker Studio, Tableau, Power BI, and cloud technologies including AWS, GCP, and Azure.
Position Overview:
Advaana Inc. is on the lookout for a skilled Digital Analytics Specialist for our NJ location. This pivotal role is designed for individuals eager to push the boundaries of digital marketing through insightful data analysis and technological integrations. The ideal candidate will be deeply versed in Google Analytics 4, supplemented by familiarity with mParticle, Firebase, and Branch/Braze.
Responsibilities:
- Mastery of Google Analytics 4 is essential, with valuable knowledge in mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze. Applicants should be proficient in tagging and ready to engage in design and architecture discussions.- Identify and integrate the optimal marketing automation software and technological solutions into clients' frameworks, ensuring alignment with their strategic objectives.- Utilize robust problem-solving capabilities to decipher metrics such as conversion rates, cost-per-lead, and click-through rates, extracting insights for progressive enhancements.- Play an instrumental role in refining marketing campaigns, elevating customer engagement, and bolstering overall business metrics through detailed data analysis and the strategic use of marketing technology tools.- Collaborate intimately with marketing teams, digital marketing professionals, data analysts, and developers to uncover opportunities, evaluate performance, and devise strategies for marketing optimization.- Engage in rigorous data analysis and reporting, adeptly employing marketing technology tools like Braze, mParticle, Branch, Snowflake, Google Analytics, and Google Tag Management for strategic decision-making.- Design, execute, and analyze A/B or multivariate tests, reporting on outcomes to guide marketing tactics.- Gather, track, and scrutinize data via KPIs such as click-through rate, conversion rate, and cost-per-lead, proposing methods to amplify customer acquisition, demand generation, and revenue.- Demonstrate intermediate expertise in new technology solutions, including project management software, digital advertising platforms, and database management and analytics.
Qualifications:
- Proficient in Google Analytics 4, with a keen understanding of mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze.- Hands-on experience with tagging, data analysis, and the application of marketing technology tools.- Strong analytical skills with the capacity to interpret complex data for business insights.- Collaborative spirit, able to work across teams and with client stakeholders.- Knowledge in conducting A/B testing, multivariate testing, and proficiency in reporting.- Intermediate level skills in project management software, digital advertising platforms, and database management and analytics.
Why Join Us?
Advaana Inc. offers a stimulating environment where innovation and growth are not just encouraged but are part of our DNA. Being at the forefront of digital analytics and marketing technology, we provide a collaborative culture where your contributions will have a direct impact on our success and that of our clients. If you are passionate about leveraging data to drive marketing success, your place is here with us.
Apply Now
Step into the future of digital marketing analytics with Advaana Inc. Submit your application today through LinkedIn or visit our website.
---
Advaana Inc. is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
